privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.termsDescription: By using our application, you accept the following conditions. These conditions are essential to ensure proper and secure use of our services.
privacy.privacyPolicyContent: We are committed to protecting your personal data. All information you entrust to us is stored securely and is never shared with third parties without your explicit consent. We use advanced encryption protocols and strictly comply with GDPR standards.
privacy.gdprContent: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights: access to your data, rectification, erasure, limitation of processing, data portability and objection to processing. You can exercise these rights by contacting us.
privacy.cookiesContent: Our application uses essential cookies for its proper functioning. These cookies do not collect any personal information and are necessary to provide you with an optimal user experience. You can manage your cookie preferences in your device settings.
